about_the_game:
Veilbound is a story-rich co-op survival RPG set in a fantasy world. Long ago, two worlds were sealed apart to prevent an age of war. Now, with the barrier shattered, creatures beyond The Veil threaten to consume everything. As a warrior bound to destiny, you must seek the Guardians of the Veil and restore balance. With your loyal rabbit spirit companion, Usagi Ginsui, you’ll master a dynamic Class System for unrestricted combat, battle legendary foes, and explore a world filled with mystery. Build a home or an entire town, recruit allies, and forge your own path—but beware, the forces beyond the Veil will not fall easily. The world of Veilbound needs a savior. Will you rise to the challenge?

Explore
Venture into different biomes and locations and unveil the secrets of this land. Gather resources and find dungeons and complete puzzles in order to improve your gear.

Survive
Make great use of your resources in order to survive. Eat, sleep, craft, avoid the harsh weather and watch out for the enemies that lurk around the corner.

Fight
Use a variety of skills and weapons in order to defeat your enemies. Improve your gear. choose your playstyle and become the great Guardlan of this land. Engage In epic boss fights, explore dungeons and defend your home.

Build
Create your custom base, be it a shack or a palace. Set your defences in order to protect agains the evil yokal that will raid your home.

Live development
You can follow the development of the game live. We will welcome your ideas and contribution!

short_description: Veilbound is a Co-op survival exploration set in a fantasy world inspired by Japanese culture. It tells the story of a two worlds sealed from eachother in order to avoid an Age of War. Now with the seal broken, it is your duty to seek the Guardians of the Veil and restore the peace to both lands.
